structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.text:
The General Assembly finds that KRS 244.602 to 244.606 are necessary in order to:
Provide an orderly three (3) tier system for the distribution and sale of quality malt beverages in the Commonwealth of Kentucky;
Promote the public health, safety, and welfare of the people of the Commonwealth of Kentucky; and
Provide a distribution system of malt beverages that will facilitate the collection and accountability of state and local taxes.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004.
